EmailTemplate.description: Guangzhou Youth Soccer League Registration 7th September
EmailTemplate.name: Guangzhou Youth Soccer League Registration 7th September
EmailTemplate.subject: Guangzhou Youth Soccer League Registration 7th September
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,<?xml:namespace prefix = o />
Our friends from the volunteer run and popular Guangzhou Youth Soccer League (GYSL) would like you to be aware that registration for this year's competition will be held next Saturday, 7th September at the venue, Utahloy International School from 9am to 12noon.
If you would like to register, PLEASE CLICK HERE for further details and a registration form.
Best wishes,
Administration Team
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
_____________________________________________________
Member of The British Schools Foundation- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International School of South East Asia - Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
